intro: Poeppigia densiflora, commonly known as the dense-flowered poeppigia, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. Poeppigia densiflora is adapted to withstand drought conditions and is often used in xeriscaping due to its low water requirements.
